title: We love: fashion fixes for the week ahead – in pictures
description: Tarot-inspired jewellery, stylish new sportswear from M&S and the ultimate red lipstick Continue reading...
author: Jo Jones and Helen Seamons
excerpt: Tarot-inspired jewellery, stylish sportswear from M&S and the ultimate red lipstick
text: Lee’s legacySarabande, the arts charity founded by Alexander McQueen (Lee to his friends), sets up shop at Selfridges, Oxford Street from 20 January to 23 March. For sale at the residency will be art, fashion, jewellery, sculpture, photography and craft pieces, from a limited-edition Thom Browne shirt to ceramic sex toys. There will also be a series of talks and artist workshops. Cardigan, £342, Av Vattev, sarabandefoundation.org and selfridges.com.
html:
Lee’s legacy

Sarabande, the arts charity founded by Alexander McQueen (Lee to his friends), sets up shop at Selfridges, Oxford Street from 20 January to 23 March. For sale at the residency will be art, fashion, jewellery, sculpture, photography and craft pieces, from a limited-edition Thom Browne shirt to ceramic sex toys. There will also be a series of talks and artist workshops. Cardigan, £342, Av Vattev, sarabandefoundation.org and selfridges.com.
